    Highly Efficient Multifunctional Drug Delivery Systems: Article Online!

    A nice article showing how simple chemistry can improve cancer specificity and efficiency of drug delivery systems.
    Congratulations Bea!
    You were also able to (finally) show that PEI does induce endossomal escape. And, for the non-believers, more evidence will follow!
    The full publication can be found in the journal or at Research gate.
